content:
Anyone planning to go to MidCamp 2020 in March? https://www.midcamp.org/2020 & https://backdropcms.org/news/events/midwest-drupal-camp-1

MidCamp 2020 | March 18th - 21st, 2020
2250 N Sheffield Ave. Chicago, IL 60614
No one from Palante can make it, but I'm curious if other folks are going and if anyone's planning a mini-camp, presentation, or any other organized Backdrop stuff there?
I am registered for Midcamp and about 95% sure I will be there. Will hold a Backdrop BOF at a very minimum. I did not submit any sessions.
I was always under the impression that MidCamp was run by people who were hostile against Backdrop, so I never expected any presence there.
I don't think that is true. Jen and Nate did Backdrop training last year and a session (I think).
I attend Midcamp every year and know many of the organizers, I don't think that they are hostile against Backdrop. But it is possible that at some point in the past they have given that impression.
Yeah, it's possible my impression is rather old and just hasn't been updated.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) "A new update is available for 'your impression'. Please update as soon as possible to avoid conflicts and issues with user experience." :big_smile:
Ah cool, thanks for the responses y'all! @StPaulTim glad to hear that you're going. @Nate Lampton are you and Jen planning to attend?
@StPaulTim I should also specifically say thanks for planning to hold a Backdrop BoF! Looking forward to hearing how that goes.
MidCamp is not yet on my schedule. So tentatively I'd say no for myself. Jen tends to travel more readily though, so she might go separately.
no I have a thing that conflicts with midcamp I think

Hi, Jen Lampton. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU
